==Trivia==
* {{w|Xalapa}} is the capital city of the {{w|Mexico|Mexican}} state of {{w|Veracruz}}.
* Xalapa or {{wt|Jalapa}} comes from the {{w|Nahuatl}} word ''Xalapan'' and means "sand by the water."
